content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 2, Southampton 1.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 2, Southampton 1.
Attempt missed. Virgil van Dijk (Southampton) header from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sofiane Boufal with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Erik Pieters.
Attempt blocked. Charlie Austin (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Manolo Gabbiadini.
Offside, Stoke City. Jack Butland tries a through ball, but Peter Crouch is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Shane Long (Southampton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ryan Bertrand with a cross.

Substitution, Stoke City. Glen Johnson replaces Mame Biram Diouf.

Goal!  Stoke City 2, Southampton 1. Peter Crouch (Stoke City) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting.
